titleStmt.title: A letter to Dr. E.S. concerning his late letter to Mr. G. and the account he gives in it of a conference between Mr. G. and himself from one who was present at the conference.
titleStmt.author: Meredith, Edward, 1648-1689?

notesStmt.note: Discussion of a letter from Edward Stillingfleet to Thomas Godden.
Attributed to Edward Meredith. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
